question_groups.name: safely_managed_sanisation_services
question_groups.label: URBAN SANITATION: Safely managed sanitation services

tooltip.text: This question contains a list of possible locations, starting with government area or district, down to the village.

questions.label: Percentage of population with safely managed containment of toilet wastes
questions.name: percentage_population_safely_managed_wastes

tooltip.text: Population using toilets with on-site containment (individual + SHARED) that is safely managed/ total population

questions.label: Percentage of population with safely managed containment of SHARED toilet wastes
questions.name: percentage_population_safely_managed_wastes_shared_toilet

tooltip.text: Population using toilets with on-site containment (SHARED only) that is safely managed/ total population

questions.label: Percentage of population with safely managed emptying of toilet wastes
questions.name: percentage_safely_managed_emptying

tooltip.text: Population using toilets with on-site containment (individual + SHARED) with safely managed emptying by licensed service providers/total population

questions.label: Percentage of population with safely managed emptying of SHARED toilet wastes
questions.name: percentage_safely_managed_emptying_shared_toilet

tooltip.text: Population using toilets with on-site containment (SHARED only) with safely managed EMPTYING of faecal sludge and wastewater by licensed service providers/ total population

questions.label: Percentage of population with safely managed transport of toilet wastes
questions.name: percentage_safely_managed_transport

tooltip.text: Population using toilets with on-site containment (individual + SHARED) with safely managed TRANSPORT of faecal sludge and wastewater by licensed service providers/ total population

questions.label: Percentage of population with safely managed transport of SHARED toilet wastes
questions.name: percentage_safely_managed_transport_shared_toilet

tooltip.text: Population using toilets with on-site containment (SHARED only) with safely managed TRANSPORT of faecal sludge and wastewater by licensed service providers/ total population

questions.label: Percentage of population with safely managed treatment of toilet wastes
questions.name: percentage_safely_managed_treatment

tooltip.text: Population using toilets with on-site containment (individual + SHARED) or sewer connections with safely managed TREATMENT of faecal sludge and wastewater by licensed service providers/ total population

questions.label: Percentage of population with safely managed treatment of SHARED toilet wastes
questions.name: percentage_safely_managed_treatment_shared_toilet

tooltip.text: Population using toilets with on-site containment (SHARED only) with safely managed TREATMENT of faecal sludge and wastewater by licensed service providers/ total population

questions.label: Percentage of population with safely managed disposal of toilet wastes
questions.name: percentage_safely_managed_disposal

tooltip.text: Population using toilets with on-site containment (individual + SHARED) with safely managed DISPOSAL of faecal sludge and wastewater by licensed service providers/ total population

questions.label: Percentage of population with safely managed disposal of SHARED toilet wastes
questions.name: percentage_safely_managed_disposal_shared_toilet

tooltip.text: Population using toilets with on-site containment (SHARED only) with safely managed DISPOSAL of faecal sludge and wastewater by licensed service providers/ total population

questions.label: Percentage of population with safely managed sanitation services
questions.name: percentage_safely_managed_sanitation

tooltip.text: Population using toilets with safely managed containment, emptying, transport, treatment and disposal of toilet wastes

questions.label: Percentage of population with safely managed sanitation services (SHARED toilets)
questions.name: percentage_safely_managed_sanitation_shared_toilet

tooltip.text: Population using toilets with safely managed containment, emptying, transport, treatment and disposal of SHARED toilet wastes

questions.label: Percentage of population with UNSAFELY managed sanitation services
questions.name: percentage_population_unsafely_managed_sanitation

tooltip.text: Population using toilets with UNSAFELY managed containment, emptying, transport, treatment and disposal of toilet wastes
